a chapter-pattern has the purpose of enabling a partial download. 
it can serve with all possible combinations of chapters.
a pattern is a list of chapternumbers or intervals of chapters, joined by semiolon

bsp:

42
chapter 42

42;45
chapters 42 and 45

42-46
chapters 42 to 46 (42, 43, 44, 45, 46)

42-46;50-52
chapters 42 to 46 and 50 to 52 (42, 43, 44, 45, 46, 50, 51, 52)
